channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pedestrian crossing beeping, where there is more than one crossing., 5th August
item.description:
There are two crossings in very close proximity to each other (Millbrook St and Gloucester Rd, opposite Arle Rd), because the crossings are so close this can cause confusion regarding which crossing has turned green. This creates a potentially fatal situation for a blind person, tactile paving and rotating cones under push button boxes should be used instead as per RNIB guidance.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10-30, Millbrook Street, Alstone, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken park equipment, 5th August
item.description:
Is there any chance this bird rocker could be fixed or replaced in the park please? Children fall off it as soon as they sit on it. It goes to far to the side and almost touches the floor. It seems like the balance has gone.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Newdawn Place, Arle, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Just fill the hole in I'm begging you, 5th August
item.description:
The barrier is blocking the pavement again. I moved it out of the way to help someone on a mobility scooter to get round it. I think it's a year old now. Fix it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Hales Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole, 5th August
item.description:
Large rectangle patch of road has broken down on middle lane just before jct 11a southbound. Deep enough to cause damage and people moving over to avoid are hazard to inside lane. Has been there for months and getting worse.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 10 inch pot hole and quite deep, 5th August
item.description:
Pot hole has been here for several weeks. It is situated in on the right hand side of the road outside 35 MILLHAM ROAD
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Millham Road, Bishop's Cleeve

item.title: Fly tipping on soft verge of road, 4th August
item.description:
There is what looks like two domestic “white goods” type appliances that have been fly tipped on the soft verge of the carriageway coming down the old Birdlip Hill just by the turning into Great Witcombe.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Way, Tewkesbury

item.title: Flytipped Electrical Equipment, 4th August
item.description:
Near a bus stop on eastbound (north) side of Lansdown Rd, by entrance to Bleasby Gardens. Thanks for sorting this out.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lansdown Road, Lansdown, Cheltenham

item.title: Series of potholes in road., 3rd August
item.description:
There are a number of potholes on this road around this point, both in the centre and in the direct line of tyres, likely to cause damage to vehicles on this busy stretch.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 58, High Street, Noverton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Alleyways dumped rubbish, 3rd August
item.description:
All the alleyways on the Springbank estate seem to have excess rubbish in, including paint cans, clothes, bags of rubbish, plastic waste. Would it be possible to have a team just walk a few alleyways and collect some of these dumped items.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Carlyle Grove, Hesters Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Awful road surface and pot holes, 3rd August
item.description:
There are lots of potholes and failed patches on the entrance into Willowbrook drive, it looks really bad and horrible to drive over. It needs a proper section repair rather than little patches which keep failing over and over.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Willowbrook Drive, Springbank, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken toys and rubbish, 3rd August
item.description:
There are a lot of broken toys and rubbish strewn over the place to the side of number 16 fulbrook close

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Fulbrook Close, Springbank, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large cover from roadworks, 3rd August
item.description:
There's a large cover left over from the city fibre workers just left on the grass verge. All the grass underneath is now dead and I imagine it will just stay there until somebody takes it away.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Willowbrook Drive, Springbank, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vehicles turning into the car park for the Quadrangle have to cross 2 lanes of traffic. Yellow box required., 3rd August
item.description:
Tenants at the Quadrangle are concerned about turning right into the Quadrangle car park as they have to cross 2 lanes of traffic. An incident occurred recently with a tenant crossing the 2 lanes. A bus stopped to let them cross one lane and as they we’re crossing the other second lane a car drove by and went straight into there car causing damage and injury. Please can you access the use of a yellow box as we are concerned more accidents like this will happen. Kind regards Quadrangle building manager.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 118, Promenade, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Large amount of broken glass on the entrance of the path to the playground and Old Pats

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southfield Approach, Naunton, Cheltenham

item.title: Paint spill on pavement, 2nd August
item.description:
Paint spill (white emulsion) on pavement, in front of no. 61. Spilt on 31st July.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 45, Cleeve View Road, Whaddon, Cheltenham

item.title: Dangerous hole around drain ., 2nd August
item.description:
The stone blocks surrounding the drain have become dislodged and a dangerous hole has appeared. It is in the highway at the entrance to the garage, the entrance which is nearest the crossroads. (There are 2 entrances). If a vehicle hit this at speed it would be very dangerous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Telephone Obstruction for Viewing, 2nd August
item.description:
A couple of weeks ago I was turning right in my car from Lower Winchcombe Street into Albion Street,Cheltenham. I almost hit a fast moving cyclist as I entered Albion Street.. He was in the Bus Lane. There is a telephone kiosk, and a post which I believe obstructed my view of the fast moving cyclist in the Bus Lane. I certainly don`t think the telephone kiosk should be in that location as it partially obscures what is coming along/my view.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, Winchcombe Street, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mandarin way , 84, 3rd August
item.description:
A deep bump/pothole. 18 inch length 4inch deep an old lady and a 50 year old have tripped in it! outside back of house can't seem to upload pictures
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 82, Mandarin Way, Kingsditch, Cheltenham

item.title: Digs barking durng sleeping hours, 2nd August
item.description:
Have spoken to the owner of the dogs on a couple of occasions asking him to please keep his dogs quiet. The dogs bark for several minutes usually at 4.30am to 5.00am. Tonight , they barked at 3.10 am.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 75, Ryeworth Road, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
